definition: thousands of purples and reds (idiom); a blaze of color/fig. a profusion of flourishing trades

sentences.english: Let's create the warm resplendence together, and greet the polychrome spring.
sentences.chinese: 让我们共同创造温暖的辉煌，迎接万紫千红的春天。

sentences.english: Alwayss colorful spring blossom with previous years.
sentences.chinese: 万紫千红总是春，花开花落昔年同。

sentences.english: With thousands of flowers in bloom and the sun shining brightly, spring is here.
sentences.chinese: 万紫千红，阳光明媚的春天已经来了。

sentences.english: Full Ying Guo, Woods Hongye dance autumn wind.
sentences.chinese: 万紫千红迎国庆，片片红叶舞秋风。

sentences.english: It is spring only when all the flowers are blooming.
Overlooking the mountains and rivers plain green, and colorful people smile.
sentences.chinese: 俯视山河平原绿，万紫千红人笑颜。

sentences.english: Full Ying Guo， Woods Hongye dance autumn wind.
sentences.chinese: 万紫千红迎国庆，片片红叶舞秋风。

sentences.english: Flowers of all sorts are blooming in a riot of colour.

definition: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
everything in the garden is lovely
green willow and red flowers/all the colors of spring
vying to be the most glamorous/each more gorgeous than the other/beauty contest
flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
the warbler sings and the swallow dances/prosperity abounds (idiom)
contending for supreme beauty (esp. of flowers, scenery, painting etc)/vying in beauty and glamor
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
